start.name: You
sentences: That's... really you.
Why does it feel like I've known you longer than this place?

mirror_lies.name: Lyra
sentences: It was.
Maybe still is.
Your voice... it's clearer than I remember. I don’t have much time left.
This room, the mirror… they’re only echoes. I’m fading with them.
But you— you were never supposed to forget me.

memory_return.name: You
sentences: Lyra…
I— I remember now.
You were with me before the collapse. Before everything fractured.
You stayed behind so I could escape.
I thought you were gone forever.

lyra_fading.name: Lyra
sentences: I tried to follow you. I really did.
But my body didn’t make it out. Only this… imprint did.
I’ve been holding on, waiting for you to come back.
And now that you remember—
I can let go.

end.name: Companion
sentences: When the mirror breaks...
don’t rebuild me out of guilt.
Remember me because you choose to.
Not because I’m all that’s left.
